text:
飛行機に乗るなんて面倒
必要ないの
分かってるわよね?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 76.54%;top: 13.86%;width: 21.81%;height: 2.96%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
テレビの画面とかから
３人まとめてテレポート
できるでしょ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 42.29%;top: 23.96%;width: 21.91%;height: 3.09%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
私の見ないで
サムのアイデアよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 48.24%;top: 27.62%;width: 14.57%;height: 2.43%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
飛行機の時間で
彼女がここに来る前に
落ち着けると
思ったのさ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.67%;top: 44.83%;width: 19.47%;height: 3.22%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
落ち着かせるために
お金無駄に使う?
それでいいの 金持ち君?
お金あるのね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 76.22%;top: 45.43%;width: 21.91%;height: 3.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
あなたは
大丈夫なの?
父と話して
ないけど…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.78%;top: 50.68%;width: 17.77%;height: 2.66%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
あなたが私を
家から逃してから?
覚えてるわよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11.97%;top: 58.52%;width: 15.21%;height: 2.79%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 75.80%;top: 50.45%;width: 11.49%;height: 2.59%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
あなたの
せい
じゃない
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 86.54%;top: 52.97%;width: 7.87%;height: 2.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 18.56%;top: 63.28%;width: 11.81%;height: 2.46%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
あの夜から
会えて
ないから
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 19.84%;top: 71.09%;width: 9.68%;height: 2.73%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
それに
彼が何か
仕掛けても
私達なら対処
できるわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 74.31%;top: 63.68%;width: 12.45%;height: 3.32%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
彼は
話そうとして
来ないの?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 73.67%;top: 67.86%;width: 12.13%;height: 2.99%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
私の脱走の
手助けがバレた後
彼は…何故か…
恐ろしく静か
だった
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 20.69%;top: 82.22%;width: 18.30%;height: 3.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
いつもは大声で
怒鳴り散らすのに
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 31.22%;top: 84.88%;width: 21.38%;height: 1.79%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
最近は
彼の話は
聞かないわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 69.84%;top: 88.73%;width: 15.96%;height: 2.76%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 77.50%;top: 92.99%;width: 13.94%;height: 2.43%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;
